From agile.txt: Agile Project Management is an iterative approach to delivering a project throughout its lifecycle. Iterative development, frequent reassessment, and adaptive planning are core tenants. Agile emphasizes collaboration, customer feedback, and small, rapid releases. Common frameworks include Scrum and Kanban....
From pm_basics.txt: Program management coordinates multiple related projects to achieve strategic objectives. It includes governance, stakeholder management, benefits realization, and alignment with organizational goals. Program managers focus on outcomes rather than outputs....
From productivity_books.txt: 'Deep Work' by Cal Newport advocates focus and distraction-free work. 'Atomic Habits' by James Clear covers habit formation and incremental improvement. 'Getting Things Done' by David Allen is a practical workflow system....
